AT.name: Wii Fit™ U
AT.description: Mit Wii Fit U, einer exklusiv für Wii U entwickelten Software, bringst du dein Fitnesstraining auf das nächste Level. Trainiere mit neuen Übungen, bei denen das Wii U GamePad, das Wii Balance Board oder beide zum Einsatz kommen, sowie mit bekannten Übungen aus Wii Fit und Wii Fit Plus! Die Kombination aus Wii Balance Board und Wii U GamePad eröffnet völlig neue Trainingsmöglichkeiten. Wii Fit U bietet jede Menge neue Aktivitäten, die für ein unterhaltsames und zielgerichtetes Training sorgen. - Trainiere und verfolge deinen Fortschritt, selbst wenn der Fernseher anderweitig genutzt wird, mit dem zweiten, in das Wii U GamePad integrierten Bildschirm! - Neue Aktivitäten und ausgewählte Übungen aus vorherigen Wii Fit-Spielen - Verwende dein vorhandenes Wii Balance Board und übertrage deine bestehenden Speicherdaten, um mit Wii Fit U deine Fitness-Ziele zu erreichen! Teile dieser Software können ohne eine Wii-Fernbedienung Plus oder eine Wii-Fernbedienung mit angeschlossenem Wii MotionPlus™-Zubehör nicht genutzt werden. Einige Teile erfordern zwei solcher Controller. Anstelle eines Nunchuk™ kann eine Wii-Fernbedienung verwendet werden.

AU.name: Wii Fit™ U
AU.description: Take your fitness routine to the next level with Wii Fit U, exclusively for Wii U. Work out with new exercises that use the Wii U GamePad, Wii Balance Board or both, as well as returning exercises from Wii Fit and Wii Fit Plus. The combination of the Wii Balance Board and Wii U GamePad creates all-new body training possibilities – and Wii Fit U has plenty of new activities that’ll get you working out in a fun and engaging way. - Work out and track your progress even when the TV is in use, with the Wii U GamePad's integrated second screen - Enjoy new activities, as well as select exercises from previous Wii Fit games - Use your existing Wii Balance Board and transfer your previous save data to continue to work towards your fitness goals in Wii Fit U Parts of this software cannot be played without a Wii Remote Plus or a Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus™ accessory attached. Some parts may require two such controllers. A Wii Remote may be used instead of a Nunchuk™.

BG.name: Wii Fit™ U
BG.description: Take your fitness routine to the next level with Wii Fit U, exclusively for Wii U. Some parts may require two such controllers. A Wii Remote may be used instead of a Nunchuk™.

BE.name: Wii Fit™ U
BE.description: Votre entraînement quotidien passe au niveau suivant avec Wii Fit U, en exclusivité sur Wii U. Gardez la forme grâce à de nouveaux exercices utilisant le Wii U GamePad, la Wii Balance Board ou les deux, et aux exercices efficaces de Wii Fit et Wii Fit Plus. La combinaison de la Wii Balance Board et du Wii U GamePad rend possible de tous nouveaux entraînements pour le corps. Wii Fit U propose une foule de nouvelles activités pour vous permettre de vous entraîner d'une manière amusante et engageante. - Faites de l'exercice et consultez votre progression même si le téléviseur est déjà utilisé grâce à l'écran intégré du Wii U GamePad - Découvrez de nouvelles activités et retrouvez des exercices classiques des versions précédentes des jeux Wii Fit - Utilisez votre Wii Balance Board et transférez votre profil précédent pour continuer votre progression dans Wii Fit U Certaines activités proposées par ce logiciel requièrent l’utilisation d’une télécommande Wii Plus ou d’une télécommande Wii équipée de l’accessoire Wii MotionPlus™. Il est parfois nécessaire d’en utiliser deux en même temps. Une télécommande Wii peut être utilisée à la place du Nunchuk™.

ES.name: Wii Fit™ U
ES.description: Lleva tu entrenamiento a un nuevo nivel con Wii Fit U, exclusivo para Wii U. Ponte en forma con nuevos ejercicios que hacen uso del Wii U GamePad, de la Wii Balance Board o de ambos, y con ejercicios ya conocidos de Wii Fit y Wii Fit Plus. La combinación de la Wii Balance Board y el Wii U GamePad crea novedosas posibilidades gimnásticas. Wii Fit U ofrece una gran cantidad de nuevas actividades para que puedas entrenar de manera divertida e interesante. - Entrena y lleva un registro de tus progresos incluso cuando la tele esté ocupada gracias a la pantalla del Wii U GamePad. - Disfruta de las nuevas actividades y de ejercicios ya conocidos de los juegos Wii Fit anteriores. - Utiliza tu Wii Balance Board y traspasa los datos guardados al nuevo Wii Fit U para seguir trabajando en pos de tus objetivos. En algunas secciones de este programa es necesario usar un mando de Wii Plus o un mando de Wii con un accesorio Wii MotionPlus™ acoplado. En algunas secciones puede ser necesario utilizar dos mandos. Se puede usar un mando de Wii en lugar del Nunchuk™.

IT.name: Wii Fit™ U
IT.description: Porta il tuo programma di allenamento a un nuovo livello con Wii Fit U, in esclusiva per Wii U. Tieniti in forma con i nuovi esercizi da svolgere con il Wii U GamePad, la Wii Balance Board o entrambi e con una selezione di esercizi tratti da Wii Fit e Wii Fit Plus. La combinazione della Wii Balance Board e del Wii U GamePad crea possibilità di allenamento inedite e Wii Fit U include tante nuove attività per tenerti in forma in modo divertente e coinvolgente. - Allenati e tieni traccia dei tuoi progressi anche senza usare la TV, grazie al secondo schermo integrato del Wii U GamePad - Cimentati in nuove attività oltre a una selezione di esercizi tratti dai titoli Wii Fit precedenti - Usa la Wii Balance Board che già possiedi e trasferisci i precedenti dati salvati per continuare a lavorare per raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi di forma fisica in Wii Fit U Alcune parti di questo software non possono essere giocate senza un telecomando Wii Plus o un telecomando Wii con accessorio Wii MotionPlus™. Alcune parti possono richiedere due accessori di questo tipo. A volte un telecomando Wii può essere usato al posto del Nunchuk™.

Some parts may require two such controllers. A Wii Remote may be used instead of a Nunchuk™.

NL.name: Wii Fit™ U
NL.description: Til je fitnessroutine naar een hoger niveau met Wii Fit U, exclusief voor Wii U. Werk je in het zweet met nieuwe oefeningen die gebruik maken van de Wii U GamePad, het Wii Balance Board, of beide. Sommige oefeningen uit Wii Fit en Wii Fit Plus zijn ook weer present. De combinatie van Wii Balance Board en Wii U GamePad opent heel nieuwe mogelijkheden om je lichaam te trainen, en Wii Fit U biedt dan ook heel wat nieuwe activiteiten die je op leuke en uitdagende manieren in beweging zetten. - Dankzij het geïntegreerde tweede scherm van de Wii U GamePad kun je altijd trainen en je vorderingen bijhouden, zelfs als de tv in gebruik is. - Geniet van nieuwe activiteiten en enkele terugkerende oefeningen uit eerdere Wii Fit-spellen - Gebruik het originele Wii Balance Board en zet je oude gegevens over om verder te trainen in Wii Fit U Bepaalde onderdelen van deze software kun je niet spelen zonder een Wii-afstandsbediening Plus of een Wii-afstandsbediening in combinatie met het Wii MotionPlus™-accessoire. Voor sommige onderdelen heb je twee van zulke controllers nodig. Soms kun je een Wii-afstandsbediening gebruiken in plaats van een Nunchuk™.

NZ.name: Wii Fit™ U
NZ.description: Take your fitness routine to the next level with Wii Fit U, exclusively for Wii U. Work out with new exercises that use the Wii U GamePad, Wii Balance Board or both, as well as returning exercises from Wii Fit and Wii Fit Plus. The combination of the Wii Balance Board and Wii U GamePad creates all-new body training possibilities – and Wii Fit U has plenty of new activities that’ll get you working out in a fun and engaging way. - Work out and track your progress even when the TV is in use, with the Wii U GamePad's integrated second screen - Enjoy new activities, as well as select exercises from previous Wii Fit games - Use your existing Wii Balance Board and transfer your previous save data to continue to work towards your fitness goals in Wii Fit U Parts of this software cannot be played without a Wii Remote Plus or a Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus™ accessory attached. The combination of the Wii Balance Board and Wii U GamePad creates all-new body training possibilities – and Wii Fit U has plenty of new activities that’ll get you working out in a fun and engaging way. - Work out and track your progress even when the TV is in use, with the Wii U GamePad's integrated second screen - Enjoy new activities, as well as select exercises from previous Wii Fit games - Use your existing Wii Balance Board and transfer your previous save data to continue to work towards your fitness goals in Wii Fit U Parts of this software cannot be played without a Wii Remote Plus or a Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus™ accessory attached. Some parts may require two such controllers. A Wii Remote may be used instead of a Nunchuk™.

PT.name: Wii Fit™ U
PT.description: Leva a tua rotina de exercício físico a um novo nível com Wii Fit U para a Wii U. Experimenta os novos exercícios que fazem uso do Wii U GamePad, do Wii Balance Board ou de ambos, assim como os que já conheces de Wii Fit e Wii Fit Plus. A combinação do Wii Balance Board com o Wii U GamePad oferece novas possibilidades de treino. Em Dessert Course, por exemplo, tens de dar passos no Wii Balance Board para servires sobremesas enquanto tentas equilibrar o GamePad como uma bandeja. - Treina e regista o teu progresso mesmo quando o televisor está a ser utilizado, com o segundo ecrã integrado do Wii U GamePad - Experimenta novas atividades, assim como exercícios dos títulos Wii Fit anteriores - Utiliza o Wii Balance Board e transfere os teus dados anteriores para continuares a trabalhar no sentido dos teus objetivos de fitness em Wii Fit U Algumas partes desta aplicação não podem ser utilizadas sem um Comando Wii Plus ou um Comando Wii com o acessório Wii MotionPlus™ encaixado. Algumas partes podem exigir a utilização dos dois comandos. Pode utilizar um Comando Wii em vez de um Nunchuk™.

RU.name: Wii Fit™ U
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. С игрой Wii Fit U для Wii U занятия спортом дома переходят на новый уровень. Выполняйте новые упражнения, используя Wii U GamePad и Wii Balance Board, или оба одновременно, а также упражнения, знакомые вам по играм Wii Fit и Wii Fit Plus. Используя аксессуар Wii Balance Board вместе с контроллером Wii U GamePad, вы откроете для себя совершенно новые возможности для тренировок, а игра Wii Fit U позаботиться о том, чтобы заниматься фитнесом дома было весело и увлекательно. - Занимайтесь спортом и следите за вашими успехами, используя второй интегрированный экран контроллера Wii U GamePad, когда телевизор занят. - Вас ждут как новые упражнения, так и знакомые упражнения из предыдущих игр серии Wii Fit. - Используя Wii Balance Board, вы можете перенести сохраненные данные из игр Wii Fit или Wii Fit Plus в Wii Fit U и продолжить идти к цели, которую поставили перед собой в прошлой игре. Часть функций этого программного обеспечения недоступна без пульта Wii Plus или пульта Wii с присоединенным аксессуаром Wii MotionPlus™. Для некоторых функций может потребоваться два таких контроллера. Вместо аксессуара Nunchuk™ можно использовать пульт Wii.

SE.name: Wii Fit™ U
SE.description: Take your fitness routine to the next level with Wii Fit U, exclusively for Wii U. Work out with new exercises that use the Wii U GamePad, Wii Balance Board or both, as well as returning exercises from Wii Fit and Wii Fit Plus. The combination of the Wii Balance Board and Wii U GamePad creates all-new body training possibilities – and Wii Fit U has plenty of new activities that’ll get you working out in a fun and engaging way. - Work out and track your progress even when the TV is in use, with the Wii U GamePad's integrated second screen - Enjoy new activities, as well as select exercises from previous Wii Fit games - Use your existing Wii Balance Board and transfer your previous save data to continue to work towards your fitness goals in Wii Fit U Parts of this software cannot be played without a Wii Remote Plus or a Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus™ accessory attached. Some parts may require two such controllers. A Wii Remote may be used instead of a Nunchuk™.
